section.name: Introduction
section.p: We've included some links in this section to related documentation about ACE.

section.name: Project Proposal
section.p: Here is a link to the original project proposal written by mattmann and ramirez in their Cs548: Information Integration on the Web class, at USC. The course was taught by Craig Knoblock and is highly recommended.
